mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum as rn, a.* from ( select b.*, coalesce(r.replycnt, 0) as replycnt from tbl_board b left join ( select board_no, count(*) as replycnt from tbl_reply group by board_no ) r on b.board_no = r.board_no where board_category_cd = #{code} and title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by b.board_no desc ) a order by rownum ) where rn <= #{page} * #{boardPerPage} and rn > (#{page}-1) * #{boardPerPage}

select * from ( select rownum as rn, a.* from ( select b.*, p.name product_name, p.content product_content, coalesce(r.replycnt,0) as replycnt from tbl_board b left join tbl_product p on b.product_id = p.product_id left join ( select board_no, count(*) as replycnt from tbl_reply group by board_no ) r on b.board_no = r.board_no where board_category_cd = 201 and title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and p.product_id = #{productId} order by b.board_no desc ) a order by rownum ) where rn <= #{page} * #{boardPerPage} and rn > (#{page}-1) * #{boardPerPage}

select * from ( select rownum as rn, a.* from ( select b.*, p.name product_name, p.content product_content, coalesce(r.replycnt,0) as replycnt from tbl_board b left join tbl_product p on b.product_id = p.product_id left join ( select board_no, count(*) as replycnt from tbl_reply group by board_no ) r on b.board_no = r.board_no where board_category_cd = 203
and p.product_id = #{productId} order by b.board_no desc ) a order by rownum ) where rn <= #{page} * #{boardPerPage} and rn > (#{page}-1) * #{boardPerPage}

select rownum as rn, a.* from ( select b.*, p.name product_name, p.content product_content, coalesce(r.replycnt,0) as replycnt from tbl_board b left join tbl_product p on b.product_id = p.product_id left join ( select board_no, count(*) as replycnt from tbl_reply group by board_no ) r on b.board_no = r.board_no where board_category_cd = 201 and r.replycnt is null order by b.board_no asc ) a where rownum <= 50 order by rownum
select b.*, p.name product_name, p.content product_content from tbl_board b left join tbl_product p on b.product_id = p.product_id where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board ( board_no, member_no, nickname, board_category_cd, product_id, title, content, regdate, upddate, mainimage ) values ( seq_board_no.nextval, #{member_no}, #{nickname}, #{board_category_cd}, #{product_id}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, sysdate, #{mainimage})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set product_id = #{product_id}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, upddate = sysdate, mainimage = #{mainimage} where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where board_category_cd = #{board_category_cd} order by board_no desc
